message.raw:
Fix hardcoded binary location in CMake

This fix is useful for multi-configuration generators in CMake (such as Visual Studio)
for which the binary location depends on the configuration .

Gazebo port of this ign-msgs PR : https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/19/fix-hardcoded-binary-location-in-cmake/diff .
